narcotics.name: Space Dust
narcotics.effect: Grants +1 bonus die to Observe and Piloting checks for 6 hours

narcotics.name: Tranquility
narcotics.effect: Reduces stress by 1; penalty die to all REF checks for 6 hours.

narcotics.name: Smoothe
narcotics.effect: Reduces stress by 1d4; increases Cool Under Fire by 2 and grants +1 bonus die to all Mental skill checks for 1 hour

narcotics.name: Chemical Strength
narcotics.effect: +1 bonus die to all PHYS checks for 1 hour; +1 movement bonus for 1 hour. After 1 hour, gain +1 penalty die to all PHYS checks and gain +1 movement penalty until sleep.
